keys: Programa de la escuela para el Certificado Júnior (JCSP
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81571</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81571</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5030</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Social Stories</string>
            <string language="es">Historias sociales</string>
            <string language="ga">Scéalta Sóisialta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialgeschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoires Sociales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Histórias Sociais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia Sociali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές ιστορίες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Social Stories to demonstrate appropriate reactions to particular social situations. People with Autism often find it difficult to understand other peoples perspectives, and are unable to engage in meaningful interaction without assistance. Social Stories can also help people with autism to understand a change or help teach routines.   </string>
            <string language="es">Historias sociales para demostrar reacciones apropiadas a situaciones sociales particulares. A las personas con autismo a menudo les resulta difícil comprender las perspectivas de otras personas, y no son capaces de involucrarse en una interacción de cier</string>
            <string language="ga">Scéalta Sóisialta chun freagraí cuí a léiriú do chásanna sóisialta éagsúla. Bíonn sé deacair ag daoine le huathachas dearcaí dhaoine eile a thuiscint agus níl siad ábalta bheith páirteach in idirghníomhaíocht bhríoch gan chúnamh. Is féidir le Scéalta Sóis</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">JCSP</string>
            <string language="es">Programa de la escuela para el Certificado Júnior (JCSP</string>
            <string language="ga">TSCS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Junior Certificate School Programme)</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialgeschichten, zum der passenden Reaktionen 
zu den bestimmten Sozialsituationen zu demonstrieren. Leute mit 
Autism häufig Entdeckung ist es schwierig, andere Völkerperspektiven
zu verstehen und nicht imstande, sich in der aussagefähigen 
Interaktion ohne Unterstützung zu engagieren. Sozialgeschichten
können Leuten mit autism auch helfen, eine Änderung zu verstehen 
oder zu helfen, Programme zu unterrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoires sociales pour démontrer des réactions
appropriées aux situations sociales particulières. Les gens 
avec d'Autism la trouvaille souvent il difficile de comprendre 
d'autres perspectives de peuples, et ne peuvent pas s'engager dans 
l'interaction signicative sans aide. Les histoires sociales 
peuvent également aider des personnes avec l'autism à comprendre un 
changement ou à aider à enseigner des sous-programmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Histórias sociais para demonstrar reações 
apropriadas às situações sociais particulares. Povos com de 
Autism achado frequentemente difícil de compreender outros 
perspectives dos povos, e é incapaz de acoplar na interação 
significativa sem auxílio. As histórias sociais podem também 
ajudar a povos com autism compreender uma mudança ou ajudá-la 
ensinar rotinas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia sociali per dimostrare le reazioni adatte 
alle situazioni sociali particolari. La gente con di Autism il 
ritrovamento spesso difficile capire altre prospettive della gente e 
non può da agganciarsi nell'interazione espressiva senza assistenza. 
Le storia sociali possono anche aiutare la gente con il autism a
capire un cambiamento o a contribuire ad insegnare le procedure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές ιστορίες για να καταδείξει τις κατάλληλες 
αντιδράσεις στις ιδιαίτερες κοινωνικές καταστάσεις. Οι 
άνθρωποι με τον αυτισμό το βρίσκουν συχνά δύσκολο να καταλάβουν 
άλλες προοπτικές λαών, και είναι ανίκανοι να συμμετέχουν στη 
σημαντική αλληλεπίδραση χωρίς βοήθεια. Οι κοινωνικές 
ιστορίες μπορούν επίσης να βοηθήσουν τους ανθρώπους με τον 
αυτισμό για να καταλάβουν μια αλλαγή ή οι οδηγίες διδάσκουν τις 
ρουτίνες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">JCSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">JCSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">JCSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">JCSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">JCSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
